Original: This request is from a young lady who
lives in a mansion at the city limits.
She has a taste for rare things.
[Page]
She wants a somewhat unusual flower.
Its blossom differs whether it is day
or night. Either will do, for her.
[Page]
It grew in this area long ago, but no
more... though I hear the flowers now
bloom in the [Color:5]Miasma Forest[Color:0].
[Page]
For the [Color:5]day[Color:0] flower, you will receive
a [Color:6][Item:1372][Color:0], and the [Color:5]night[Color:0] flower
will earn you an [Color:6][Item:1373][Color:0].
[Page]
It is up to you which flower to bring
her and thus which reward to claim.
I shall await your swift return.
[Page]
Hm... Now that I have explained the
quest, it occurs to me to wonder what
kind of flower might bloom at [Color:5]dawn[Color:0]...
Translation: This request is from a young lady who
lives in a mansion at the city limits.
She has a taste for rare things.
[Page]
She wants a somewhat unusual flower.
Its blossom differs whether it is day
or night. Either will do, for her.
[Page]
It grew in this area long ago, but no
more... though I hear the flowers now
bloom in the [Color:5]Miasma Forest[Color:0].
[Page]
For the [Color:5]day[Color:0] flower, you will receive
a [Color:6][Item:1372][Color:0], and the [Color:5]night[Color:0] flower
will earn you an [Color:6][Item:1373][Color:0].
[Page]
It is up to you which flower to bring
her and thus which reward to claim.
I shall await your swift return.
[Page]
Hm... Now that I have explained the
quest, it occurs to me to wonder what
kind of flower might bloom at [Color:5]dawn[Color:0]...

Original: Welcome back. Were you able to find
the young lady's desired flower?
Translation: Welcome back. Were you able to find
the young lady's desired flower?

Original: My... it is beautiful. You say you
picked this flower at night? It has
a rather ladylike quality to it.
[Page]
I wonder if any gallant soul might
appear one day and give me a flower
this lovely...
[Page]
That was a joke. This should be more
than good enough for the client.
Here is the matching reward...
Translation: My... it is beautiful. You say you
picked this flower at night? It has
a rather ladylike quality to it.
[Page]
I wonder if any gallant soul might
appear one day and give me a flower
this lovely...
[Page]
That was a joke. This should be more
than good enough for the client.
Here is the matching reward...

Original: My... it is lovely. You say you picked
this flower during the day? It feels
as if it has an overabundance of life.
[Page]
I wonder if any gallant soul might
appear one day and give me a flower
this lovely...
[Page]
That was a joke. This should be more
than good enough for the client.
Here is the matching reward...
Translation: My... it is lovely. You say you picked
this flower during the day? It feels
as if it has an overabundance of life.
[Page]
I wonder if any gallant soul might
appear one day and give me a flower
this lovely...
[Page]
That was a joke. This should be more
than good enough for the client.
Here is the matching reward...

Original: My... what an unusual flower. That red
and white pattern is quite striking.
This bloomed just at dawn, you say?
[Page]
Haha... It is so beautiful that it
may be difficult to part with when
I deliver it...
[Page]
That was a joke. I will, as ever, take
full responsibility for my end. But...
I am not sure how to reward you now.
[Page]
The day reward or the night reward...
Well, this flower has elements of each,
so both rewards may be appropriate.
[Page]
I am sure the client will agree when
she sees what a lovely flower you have
fetched her. Go ahead, take them.
Translation: My... what an unusual flower. That red
and white pattern is quite striking.
This bloomed just at dawn, you say?
[Page]
Haha... It is so beautiful that it
may be difficult to part with when
I deliver it...
[Page]
That was a joke. I will, as ever, take
full responsibility for my end. But...
I am not sure how to reward you now.
[Page]
The day reward or the night reward...
Well, this flower has elements of each,
so both rewards may be appropriate.
[Page]
I am sure the client will agree when
she sees what a lovely flower you have
fetched her. Go ahead, take them.

Original: When you emerge into a small clearing
in the forest, you notice something in
the corner.
[Page]
It may be the flower you were charged
with finding... To be certain, you
decide to investigate.
Translation: When you emerge into a small clearing
in the forest, you notice something in
the corner.
[Page]
It may be the flower you were charged
with finding... To be certain, you
decide to investigate.

Original: You study the rocks in the corner of
the clearing and see a beautiful
flower with bugle-shaped petals.
Translation: You study the rocks in the corner of
the clearing and see a beautiful
flower with bugle-shaped petals.

Original: A beautiful flower with bugle-shaped
petals is blooming in front of you...
Translation: A beautiful flower with bugle-shaped
petals is blooming in front of you...

Original: Its color is white as the moon. There
is no doubt that this large flower is
the one the client desires.
Translation: Its color is white as the moon. There
is no doubt that this large flower is
the one the client desires.

Original: Its red coloration is as vibrant as
the sun. There is no doubt this large
flower is the one the client desires.
Translation: Its red coloration is as vibrant as
the sun. There is no doubt this large
flower is the one the client desires.

Original: The gradation of color on the petals,
white to red, is as beautiful as the
peach-colored light of the dawn sky.
[Page]
This flower is a rare sight, one you
were only able to see because you came
at the threshold of morning and night.
[Page]
You have no doubt that the client will
be satisfied if you return with this
flower.
Translation: The gradation of color on the petals,
white to red, is as beautiful as the
peach-colored light of the dawn sky.
[Page]
This flower is a rare sight, one you
were only able to see because you came
at the threshold of morning and night.
[Page]
You have no doubt that the client will
be satisfied if you return with this
flower.

Original: You may pick it now to complete the
request or wait and pick it after some
time has passed.
Translation: You may pick it now to complete the
request or wait and pick it after some
time has passed.

Original: [Color:5]Pick the flower?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Pick the flower?[Color:0]

Original: The request is complete! All that now
remains is to deliver the flower when
you are next in Tharsis.
Translation: The request is complete! All that now
remains is to deliver the flower when
you are next in Tharsis.

Original: If the bartender spoke true, then the
flower takes different forms during
the day and night...
[Page]
You decide to leave the flower be and
pass the time elsewhere for now.
Translation: If the bartender spoke true, then the
flower takes different forms during
the day and night...
[Page]
You decide to leave the flower be and
pass the time elsewhere for now.

Original: You study the rocks in the corner of
the clearing and discover a large
flower bud.
[Page]
This bud must develop into the flower
whose nature changes with the time
of day.
[Page]
But it does not seem that the flower
has bloomed yet... You decide to
leave it be and come back later.
Translation: You study the rocks in the corner of
the clearing and discover a large
flower bud.
[Page]
This bud must develop into the flower
whose nature changes with the time
of day.
[Page]
But it does not seem that the flower
has bloomed yet... You decide to
leave it be and come back later.

Original: [Color:3]Your map of the [Color:5]Miasma Forest[Color:3] has
been updated.[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:3]Your map of the [Color:5]Miasma Forest[Color:3] has
been updated.[Color:0]
